full_text: Another Mike Trout home run! Way to recover from illness.
If the Packers don’t draft a receiver in the first 2 rounds the Watkins signing won’t look as good. For now though I’m assuming this is phase 1 of their plan.
Watkins on a one year deal is a low risk medium reward move for the Packers. If he stinks he’s gone next year but if he produces $4 million will be a steal.
